name: Chocolove
description:
Chocolove is a simple deck building game: you have only one card in hand, swiping it right or left activate different effects! 

Made with Löve for löve jam 2021.

Credits:

  • Programming, graphics, game design: sprvrn
  • Sound effects
  • Font Equipment by Somepx
  • Color palette Pollen8 by Conkey
